page.title: 04RINGWOOD RD&RESIDENTIAL AREA
page.content: Our study of the Ringwood rd.was bet- ween Wallisdown rd.junction and Ross- more rd.The Ringwood rd.links up with the A31,A27 and the M3 which leads onto London.A new road,Canford Way,links Ringwood rd. to the busy Dorchester and Wareham road routes.The Ringwood rd.is used by heavy and light vehicles.In the summer the Ringwood rd.is very busy because of the holiday makers.The vehicles that use Ringwood rd.are lorries,cars,coaches and motor cycles.Its peak period is 7:00 to 9:00 AM and 4:00 to 6:00 PM. RESIDENTIAL AREAS: On both sides of the Ringwood Road there are housing estates.In Belben Avenue there is a large Council housing estate.Along Alderney Avenue there are private bungalows.Along the Rossmore road Estate, there is mixed housing, private and Council.
